Title: Unaudited version of OpenZeppelin used
Content:
The repository in which the audited contracts are held is using [*openzeppelin-solidity*](https://github.com/centrehq/centre-tokens/blob/4b9ebf3941a48e41e7363fee729035610a71ca66/package.json#L39) [`v1.11.0`](https://github.com/centrehq/centre-tokens/blob/4b9ebf3941a48e41e7363fee729035610a71ca66/package.json#L39). This is an outdated release, and was never audited. At the time of writing the latest stable version is [`v2.0.0`](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/tree/v2.0.0), which has gone through an external security audit.


Consider updating the project to the newer, audited version.
